00043 class CalvinValue
00044 {
00045 public:
00047         enum ParameterType { 
00048                           Int8Type,                     
00049                           UInt8Type,            
00050                           Int16Type,            
00051                           UInt16Type,           
00052                           Int32Type,            
00053                           UInt32Type,           
00054                           FloatType,            
00055                           TextType,                     
00056                           AsciiType,            
00057                           UnknownType           
00058         };
00059 
00060 protected:
00061         ParameterType m_eParameterType;
00062         AffxString m_strValue;
00063 
00064 public:
00065         CalvinValue() {clear();}
00066         CalvinValue(ParameterType eParameterType, const AffxString& strValue) 
00067         {
00068                 m_eParameterType = eParameterType;
00069                 m_strValue = strValue;
00070         }
00071         ParameterType getParameterType() {return m_eParameterType;}
00072         AffxString& getValue() {return m_strValue;}
00073         void clear() {m_eParameterType = UnknownType; m_strValue.clear();}
00074         
00081         int compareTo(CalvinValue& that, int iCompareCode)
00082         {
00083                 int iCompareResult = 0;
00084                 switch (iCompareCode)
00085                 {
00086                 case 0:
00087                         switch (m_eParameterType)
00088                         {
00089                         case TextType:
00090 //                              iCompareResult = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(m_strValue).compareTo(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(that.m_strValue), iCompareCode);
00091                         case AsciiType:
00092                                 iCompareResult = m_strValue.compareTo(that.m_strValue, iCompareCode);
00093                         case FloatType:
00094                                 iCompareResult = AffxArray<float>::compare((float)::getDouble(m_strValue), (float)::getDouble(that.m_strValue));
00095                         case UInt32Type:
00096                                 iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(::getUnsignedInt(m_strValue), ::getUnsignedInt(that.m_strValue));
00097                         default:
00098                                 iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(::getInt(m_strValue), ::getInt(that.m_strValue));
00099                         }
00100                         break;
00101                 }
00102                 return iCompareResult;
00103         }
00104 };

00173 class CalvinDataSet
00174 {
00175 protected:
00176         AffxString m_strName;
00177         AffxArray<AffxString> m_vColumnHeaders;
00178         AffxArray<AffxArray<CalvinValue> > m_mxCalvinValues;
00179 
00180 public:
00181         CalvinDataSet()
00182         {
00183         }
00184 
00185         virtual ~CalvinDataSet() 
00186         {
00187                 clear();
00188         }
00189         
00190         void clear() 
00191         {
00192                 m_vColumnHeaders.deleteAll();
00193                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_mxCalvinValues.getCount()); iIndex++)
00194                 {
00195                         m_mxCalvinValues.getAt(iIndex)->deleteAll();
00196                 }
00197                 m_mxCalvinValues.deleteAll();
00198         }
00199         
00200         void setName(const AffxString& str) {m_strName = str;}
00201         AffxString& getName() {return m_strName;}
00202         AffxArray<AffxString>& getColumnHeaders() {return m_vColumnHeaders;}
00203         AffxArray<AffxArray<CalvinValue> >& getCalvinValues() {return m_mxCalvinValues;}
00204

00215                 {
00216                 case 0:
00217                         iCompareResult = m_strName.compareTo(that.m_strName, 0);
00218                         break;

00220                 return iCompareResult;
00221         }
